name: Grilled Lamb Souvlaki
description: Tender pieces of marinated lamb grilled to perfection, served with warm pita bread and a side of tzatziki sauce.

name: Falafel Plate
description: Crispy falafel made from ground chickpeas and herbs, served with hummus, tabbouleh, and a side of pita bread.

name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, topped with a drizzle of olive oil and oregano.
